title: ULTIMATE 1980S & BEYOND - 24 HOUR 80s MEGA MIX (80'S)
description:
BED BUGS & BALLY HOO ITS THE 80s AND BEYOND 24 hour MEGAMIX!!!

HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

From Madonna to Queen to MJ to the Eurythmics to Hall & Oates to Prince to all those brilliant ONE HIT WONDERS you love to hate, early rap, dance, hip h0p, electro RnB, and those ever so "guilty pleasure" ROCK BALLADS plus more and more and more

THIS IS NOT MY INSIDE VOICE!

  As the holidays come rollin in I get nostalgic and always wish I had completed my favorite 80s mix but always left it halfway done. I finally finished it

ÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚ÂªÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚ÂªÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Âª for the most part

Kept it mostly 80s with a dash of some "ahead of their time" 70s jams along with artists who could just not let go as we entered the 90s

I also tried to compile some of the best quality mp3s. A lot of 80s stuff on the net is terrible quality 

plusÃŽâ€œÃƒâ€¡Ã‚Âª.

You can never find a good mix to purchase because usually record companies can gather one hit wonders on separate compilations from their big artist greatest hits counterparts.... 

BUT

It is here all PUT together for the first time for all to enjoy and download... 3 GIGABYTES OF SOLID JAMS 

 some more names... depeche mode, kool & the gang, toto, the police, BLONDIE, irene caro, dire straits, LL cool J, belinda carlisle, tiffany, inxs, YELLO, human league, ROCKY THEME, we are the world, AIR SUPPLY, PAT BENATAR, NWA, VAN HALEN, CYNDI LAUPER, supertramp, bon jovi, u2, new order, erasure, rakim, the cars, tone loc, JOURNEY, boy meets girl, billy joel, bananarama, RUN DMC. YOUNG MC, kurtis blow, echo and the bunnymen, DURAN DURAN, biz markie, pink floyd, def leppard, yazoo, CHICAGO... More AND MORE........

i know some will complain..no GNR no Poison no naughty by nature i love them but hey shove it SAVE SOME FOR NEXT TIME!!!

HAPPY THANKSGIVING AMERICANS!
